title: 523 My Faith Has Found a Resting Place

lines: 1. My faith has found a resting place Not in a man-made creed; I trust the ever living One, That He for me will plead.
Refrain : I need no other evidence, I need no other plea; It is enough that Jesus died And rose again for me.
2. Enough for me that Jesus saves, This ends my fear and doubt; A sinful soul I come to Him, He will not cast me out.
3. My soul is resting on the Word, The living Word of God: Salvation in my Saviour's name, Salvation through His blood.
4. The great Physician heals the sick The lost He came to save; For me His precious blood He shed, For me His life He gave.
